text:
"I Don't Care" is a song recorded by English singer Ed Sheeran and Canadian singer Justin Bieber. It was released on May 10, 2019. as the lead single from Sheeran's fourth studio album, "No. 6 Collaborations Project". The two wrote the song with Jason Boyd and its producers, Fred Gibson, Max Martin, and Shellback. The song is Sheeran's and Bieber's third collaboration together. Sheeran co-wrote Bieber's 2015 song "Love Yourself", and the two appeared on the 2019 single "Earth" by rapper Lil Dicky.
The song entered at the top of the Australian and UK charts and at number two in the US and New Zealand.
